navigation.newsletter: Stay updated with our latest news and offers, we will reach you.

home.a-description-1: We produce the finest apparel for our clients to supply them with the highest quality materials to be transformed into trendsetting designs for their customers all around the world.
home.a-description-2: We offer a vast variety of innovative designs made of different materials with the latest technologies and state-of-the-art manufacturing methods.
home.a-description-3: Dedicated to innovation, Vestis always tries to improve its activities in all factory processes. In respect to people and the environment, we embrace sustainability in order to leave a positive impact on future generations.
